I hate how sizing is so difficult nowadays.  Slim fit, casual fit, loose fit, classic fit, athletic fit, etc.  makes it impossible to just say waist and inseam and know if something is going to fit.  Dickies is truly the worse for this.  I have worn 874s for decades.  Everyone knows you have to go up a size or two on the waist to what you would normally wear.  I figured these would be the same, they look like 874s but I thought the “slim fit” would make the legs a little less baggy.  I ordered the same waist as I order for 874s and they are a size to big.  Even though they are supposed to be “slim”. I wish you could just order the size based on your measurements, or it would at least be consistent across a single manufacturer.
I usually wear a waist 34, but this 36 is perfect for me, like the original 874 pants. (6ft, 200lb) And it is narrower than 874, a good fit. I hope this helps!

评论概述: Now That’s A Nice Pair Of Pants
评论详情: I recently bought a couple of pairs of these Dickies and I really like them. I picked the 36x30 for my 5’11”, 202 lbs frame. I like how you can dress these up or down. The only issues I’ve run into with these pants are 1) the pockets aren’t as deep as I’d like and 2) the clasp comes undone more than I’d like. If there was a button on the pants this wouldn’t be an issue but with a belt on, it doesn’t seem to happen as often.

I cycle through work pants regularly, I work outside year round.  These pants, weirdly, are the toughest and most breathable. You can sometimes feel the wind through them, but they don’t lack in durability because of that. I find breathable work pants usually fall apart easily.
Very happy with this size-bought two pair.

评论概述: I got used Dickies not new
评论详情: I use Dickies on the daily for work. So when I order more I got one brand new pair, tags and all. However the charcoal pair came with no tags and did not feel crisp like the navy pair. I started looking at them both and realized the charcoal were used, washed and folded, which is why the tags were not on them. I am very disappointed and the fact that I received someone's old pair of Dickies. The inside seam was so faded, the threading was frailed, and the felt like my old pairs that I I already have at home. Use caution when you buy. Very sad.
